description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2a31i","text":"Primary cortical neurons were prepared from C57BL/6J mice embryonic day 17. The dissected cortical tissue was digested, triturated, and centrifuged. Cells were plated onto poly (L-lysine)-coated 24-well plates at 106 cells per well and cultured in NB-A with 2% B27 (Invitrogen, USA). After 24 h in culture, 5µg/ml cytarabine was added to inhibit the growth of glial cells in the medium and then changed to the original medium 48 h later. Neurons were cultured for 5 days and ready for experiments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":215,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c39hu","text":"For Primary cortical neuronal culture  - Use C57BL/6J mice at embryonic day 17 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fona0","text":"Anesthetized pregnant mice (1% sodium pentobarbital, 80mg/kg), dissect their embryos and collect the cortex. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4m0l9","text":"(Separate and remove the soft membrane and blood vessels, rinse the cerebral cortex in PBS, and use the ophthalmic scissor to cut pieces of the cortex)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"51esa","text":"Collect the cortices in PBS  in a 50 ml tube on ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e6j9p","text":"(The 50 ml tube contains 30 ml of PBS)   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B4C8D7B18DEC11ECA1850A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1um01","text":"Transfer the cortices to 15 ml tubes containing 1.5 ml trypsin–EDTA (0.25%) and incubate it at   for   Dissociate the cortices by triturating with a 10 mL serological pipette 10 – 15 times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":95,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":101,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BB6E965E8DEC11ECA1850A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":900,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BB6E97E98DEC11ECA1850A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9e2ke","text":"Triturate the cell suspension 10 times with a 1ml pipette","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2f39i","text":"Coat 24 well plate with   (PLL)  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f5qoe","text":"Place the cover glass at the bottom of the 24-well plate and add 400ul/well of PLL coating ( 0.01%) for 24h and incubate at    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":124,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1dtl7","text":"Wash 3 times with PBS after   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":211,"mol_weight":128.17,"name":"Poly-L-Lysine","linfor":"C6H12N2O","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"CA2EE830893011EC8C9F5B2B257BD497","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":1,"name":"Contributed by users","link":"https://www.protocols.io","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/1.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/1.png"}}}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"3AF8CEF0893111EC8C9F5B2B257BD497","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"4338EE10893111EC8C9F5B2B257BD497","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"efj1n","text":"Seed the cells onto PLL coated 24-well plates at a cell density of 106 cells/well containing specialized    supplemented with 2%  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":69,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":105,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":129,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"35o62","text":"Incubate for   at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":13,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"69qs5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":210520,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Neurobasal\u0026trade;-A Medium","linfor":"","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/10888022","sku":"10888022","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"965E7440893411EC8C9F5B2B257BD497","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":440,"name":"Thermo Fisher","link":"https://www.thermofisher.com","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/440.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/440.png"}}}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":169551,"mol_weight":0,"name":"B-27™ Supplement (50X), serum free","linfor":"","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/17504044","sku":"17504044","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"C38FBCF0893211EC8C9F5B2B257BD497","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":311,"name":"Gibco - {"blocks":[{"key":"5kbvi","text":"Post 24 h, add 2µg/well of cytarabine (Stock - 5µg/ml) to the culture to inhibit the glial cell growth.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4l7eq","text":"  later remove the medium completely  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"268d","text":"Add 400µl/well of NB-A supplemented with 2% B27 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":172800,"guid":"10EB3470893311EC8C9F5B2B257BD497","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6icmq","text":"Transduction with BRAF (Optional)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3aaa0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5a78n","text":"After 5 days of culture, these cells are ready for further experiment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f3h9i","text":"After 5 days, the neurons were transduced with BRAFV600E, or BRAFWT, or vector lentivirus with 8 μg/ml polybrene (Sigma–Aldrich, USA) for 24 h.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":52,"length":4},{"style":"sup","offset":65,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7u8qn","text":"The cells were cultured in NB-A for 120 h and used for subsequent experiments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
